headings.content: DeFi Skeptic. A Platform Designed to Better DeFi.

texts.content: Enhancing Decentralized Finance via project vetting, user- and developer-tailored products and services, powered by a token built to last.

items.title: Project Vetting
items.subtitle: Information
items.description: Our project vetting provides numerous benefits to the project as well as the DeFi space and users. We provide multi-chain project vetting, spanning across multiple aspects within a project to gauge the projects level of transparency & security.

items.title: For Developers & Users
items.subtitle: Transparency & Security
items.description: Whether you are a DeFi developer looking to start a project or take your project to the next level, you have come to the right place! We provide a full range of developer focused services. Additionally, we provide various services/utilities focused at the DeFi user to make your journey safer and seamless.

items.title: Tokenized NFTs
items.subtitle: Utility
items.description: We believe the user should get to decide whether they want utility or rewards. So we decided to tokenize our NFTs by pairing them to SKP tokens. You can swap tax free between SKP and NFT anytime and as often as you want. SKP is for our utility, First Skeptics NFTs are for rewards, own both by owning one!

items.title: Partners & Affiliates
items.subtitle: Strategy
items.description: The DeFi Skeptic team is a strong believer in collaboration over competition. Working with likeminded platforms/projects and sharing each otherâ€™s resources is a key component of DeFi Skeptic and a valued aspect of our platform. Take a look at our huge family of partners and affiliates and how we are positively impacting the DeFi space as a collective!
